entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull prevents automatic exception documentation #77281
  • The CompilersPackage is using old setup targets that may be obsolete #77269

Closed

  • Crash when doing override completion in front of an attribute #77193
  • Regression in 17.13: IntroduceVariableCodeRefactoringProvider is broken when using parameterless constructor of target type #77276
  • Nullable Quick Info for `field` uses unspeakable name #77219
  • NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateCSharpTemplateProjects is flakey #74157
    Backlog
  • Flaky test: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects #74827
    Backlog
  • [Infra] Re-enable tests that utilize `DotNetSdkMSBuildInstalled` #67566
    18.0
  • Creating new file does not respect .editorconfig tab setting #22171
    Backlog
  • DocumentId's need a way to indicate that they refer to a SourceGenerated document. #64397
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35818.40 #77268

PullRequests

Created

  • Update debugger contracts to fix hot reload issue #77284
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: include receiver parameter in display string #77283
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Partial events and constructors: more tests #77280
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make diagnostic checksum computation into an extension method. #77277
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disallow initializers on partial constructor definitions #77275
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Mix the source generator version info into the dependent checksum we get for projects #77273
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow Semantic Search query function to take symbol parameter #77272
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure diagnostics refresh when source generators run in balanced mode #77271
    untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Disable realtime monitoring in the PR-validation pipeline #77282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything
  • Fix crash in 'introduce variable' when converting an object creation expression to an implicit object creation expression #77279
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix override completion when attribute below #77242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Update PublicAPI files for 17.13 ship #77266
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix Quick Info nullability display for backing fields #77240
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge main to runtime async branch #77265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make Workspaces.MSBuild build with a netstandard target #76832
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update Razor EA #77194
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Generate Documentation Auto-Insert #76665
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update to release nuget packages #77261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
